description.value:
You hide fragile pods of pollen or other clinging powder that get in the eyes of the first creature that enters the snare's square. The creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:17] saving throw. A creature dazzled by the pollen can use an Interact action to attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] to remove the condition.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is dazzled for 1 round.

Failure The creature is dazzled for 10 minutes.

Critical Failure The creature is blinded for 1 round and dazzled for 10 minutes after.

publication.title: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On
